title: Boutique Stay in Toowoomba’s Grandest Historic Hotel
description: In the vibrant city of Toowoomba, you'll find this heritage-listed gem, one of Australia’s great classic hotels and the perfect place for a romantic getaway: Vacy Hall. Set in over an acre of beautiful gardens and oozing vintage glamour, this boutique property is ideally located just moments from all Toowoomba has to offer. Enjoy delicious daily cooked breakfast, a bottle of wine on arrival and a leisurely late 12pm check out.
